title: Idea Navigator
description: The Idea Navigator is a tool that automatically organize and sort your data into clusters of similar data, which you can visualize and navigate through on a 2D space.

title: Bounce
description: Bounce is a web app that helps you keep track of your responsibilities and also helps suggests recipes and groceries.

title: Portfolio
description: This is my portfolio, where I showcase my projects and skills.

title: Exploratory Data Analysis
description: I examined the data on single family zoning vs other housing zoning in the Greater Boston Area and proposed solutions that could help alleviate the housing crisis.

title: Visualization Design
description: I drew visualizations to help answer the question: How has the gender distribution across age groups changed from 1900 to 2000? I iterated on these designs to produce a final visualization to best answer this question.

title: Persuasive or Deceptive Visualization?
description: I designed 2 visualizations: an earnest one and a deceptive on on the proposition "The global greenhouse gas emission decreased significantly during the COVID pandemic." I examined each to see what made it effective.

title: Decaf Compiler
description: I am building a compiler of the Decaf programming language in Rust.

title: Pokerbots
description: I built a program and implemented different strategies to play a variation of Poker against other programs.

title: High School Game
description: I created a game in GameMaker Studio 2 that takes place in my high school.

title: Box Stacker
description: I created a game where players have to move around boxes to advance to navigate to the next level.

title: Rick & Morty App
description: I created a website that took data from the Rick & Morty API and displayed it in a user-friendly way.
I put my game development skills to the test by recreating the popular game 2048.
